title: Old champ select music

embed.description: This is the old League of Legends Ranked Game Song. Enjoy! If you are looking for the new one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c1ODXlseUrs Sign Up to League of Legends Here - https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/

body:
are we able to change the in game files to the old champ select music? i understand riot doesnt want/ allow this but for something so small i think it should be allowed? or maybe an option to change it back to the old music



TLDR: would i get banned for modifying the in game champ select music

replies.body: Pretty sure you still can. I used to have under pressure as the lobby music for ranked queue back in season 4 for fun. Don't think there are any issues with it. Probably a guide on you tube with how to do it too...

this right here is my...
> _**J A M !**_
